name: JavaScript for Intermediate Learners
description: JavaScript is a high-level, dynamic, untyped, and interpreted programming language.
author: Mozilla
course_info:
Welcome to the "JavaScript for Intermediate Learners" course! Are you ready to take your knowledge and career to the next level?

30 hours of on-demand videos, 50 coding exercises, 70 quizzes, and 12 assignments. All this is to help you start coding in JavaScript like a pro.

I'm a Mozilla developer with over 10 years of experience. I will help you on this journey every step of the way, no matter if you are a complete beginner who has never coded before or a developer who wants to advance to the next level. We will start from the basics, but we will not stop there.

I will not only teach you how to code but also how to code well. Clean code and good design will be our priorities, and design patterns will be shown in practice, not as abstract concepts that seem impossible to be used in real-life challenges. Refactoring will be something we practice all the time.

section1.title: Getting Started
section1.content: In this section, we will learn the basics of JavaScript programming language.

section2.title: Variables and Data Types
section2.content: In this section, we will learn about variables and data types in JavaScript.

section3.title: Control Structures
section3.content: In this section, we will learn about control structures in JavaScript.

section4.title: Functions
section4.content: In this section, we will learn about functions in JavaScript.

section5.title: Object-Oriented Programming
section5.content: In this section, we will learn about object-oriented programming in JavaScript.

section6.title: DOM and Events
section6.content: In this section, we will learn about DOM and events in JavaScript.

section7.title: AJAX and JSON
section7.content: In this section, we will learn about AJAX and JSON in JavaScript.

section8.title: Testing and Debugging
section8.content: In this section, we will learn about testing and debugging in JavaScript.

section9.title: Final Project
section9.content: In this section, we will learn about final project in JavaScript.
